Description: A unique identifier with which to join data records with survey-level information
The location for the corresponding count data
The scientific name of the phocid species
The common name of the phocid species
The sum of all of the other '_count' columns. I.e., the total count for the corresponding census/location/species
Aggregate count of adult females for the corresponding census/location/species
Aggregate count of adults of unknown sex
Aggregate count of juveniles of unknown sex
Aggregate count of pups (less than one year old)
Aggregate count of females of unknown age class
Aggregate count of males of unknown age class
Aggregate count of animals of unknown sex and unknown age class
